```
require 'test/unit'

class TestClass
    def initialize( aVal )
        @val = aVal * 10
    end

    def getVal
        return @val
    end
end

class MyTest < Test::Unit::TestCase
    def test1
        t = TestClass.new(10)
        assert_equal(100, t.getVal)
        assert_equal(101, t.getVal)
        assert(100 != t.getVal)
    end

    def test2
        assert_equal(1000,TestClass.new(100).getVal)
    end
end
```
